message:
Fresher: I want to change my department what should I do?
Someone: Ask the people who made depc previous years.
Fresher:How?
Student Welfare Group:Make Your Choice!!

Hola Freshers!!
Student Welfare Group now provides you the solution of the most common fresher problem of IIT kharagpur.Department Change(depc) comes with What?How?Where? So here is the chance to 'Make Your Choice' by having a conversation with the people who made Depc in last years and get answers to all your queries.

Venue:V4
Date:01/09/17
Time:6:15 pm

message: Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur shared a group. Hola Freshers!! We saw a large number of participation in the last PDS Doubt session. We hope it was helpful to you. To make it more organized, we have made an exclusive group for PDS enthusiasts. Join the group and you will be updated with all the activities regarding PDS doubt session. https://www.facebook.com/groups/1633822569992748/

story: Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur added 8 new photos.
message:
The Mentor-Mentee Meeting brought many freshers close to the seniors of their own department. From this point, it's the responsibility of the Mentors and specially Mentees to take care of the bond that has been created by our joint efforts. Here are some pics of Day 2 of the Mentor-Mentee Meeting. 
#Day2

Doubts kill more dreams than failure ever will."
PDS Doubt Sessions for UG 1st year students will begin from 19th August, Saturday. Every Saturday and Sunday.
Timings: 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM
Venue: F-232, Main Building. 
Be there!

P.S.: The PDS Doubt Session on 12th August was canceled because of unavailability of rooms due to some academic programs.

Attention Mentors and Mentees! 
Kindly find each other here: http://swgiitkgp.in/smp/check_smp_group.php
It's time to meet, to know each other and to appreciate each others presence. So here we are at your service. The Mentor Mentee Meeting will be organised on 19th and 20th of August. Check your emails for the information of slot at Gymkhana.
We hope we'll see you guys tomorrow!
In case of any inconvenience contact:
Dileep Shukla: 8436946888
Utkarsh: 9532878732

message:
"Here in this place of that Hijli Detention Camp stands the fine monument of India, representing India's urges, India's future in the making.This picture seems to be symbolical of the changes that are coming to India."   - Jawahar Lal Nehru
Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur wishes IIT Kharagpur a glorious 67th Foundation Day!! Happy Birthday IIT Kharagpur !!
66 years to service of the Nation.
#hbdkgp
#IITKGPFoundationDay

Attention Freshers! 
Student Welfare Group brings you the opportunity to know more about the Student Mentor Program. The objective of this programme is to help the First years understand the various aspects of college life, and adapt accordingly under the mentorship of experienced seniors.
An interactive session of all the First-Year Undergraduate Students with the SWG Team will be held on 17th August, Thursday at Vikramshila (V2) as per the following slot:
6:30 PM – AE, CE, CH, CS, EC, HS, IE, MA, MF, ME, NA & PH
8:00 PM – AG, AR, BT, CY, EE, EX, GG, IM, MT, MI & QD
